text: May 15, 2018 / 6:02 PM / Updated 24 minutes ago IPL Scoreboard Reuters Staff 3 Min Read May 15 (OPTA) - Scoreboard at close of play on the first day of match 49 between Kolkata Knight Riders and Rajasthan Royals on Tuesday at Kolkata, India Kolkata Knight Riders win by 6 wickets Rajasthan Royals 1st innings Rahul Tripathi c Dinesh Karthik b Andre Russell 27 Jos Buttler c Javon Searles b Kuldeep Yadav 39 Ajinkya Rahane b Kuldeep Yadav 11 Sanju Samson lbw Sunil Narine 12 Ben Stokes c&b Kuldeep Yadav 11 Stuart Binny st Dinesh Karthik b Kuldeep Yadav 1 Krishnappa Gowtham c Dinesh Karthik b Shivam Mavi 3 Jaydev Unadkat b Prasidh Krishna 26 Ish Sodhi c Dinesh Karthik b Prasidh Krishna 1 Jofra Archer c Shubman Gill b Andre Russell 6 Anureet Singh Not Out 3 Extras 0b 1lb 0nb 0pen 1w 2 Total (19.0 overs) 142 all out Fall of Wickets : 1-63 Tripathi, 2-76 Rahane, 3-85 Buttler, 4-95 Samson, 5-96 Binny, 6-103 Gowtham, 7-107 Stokes, 8-128 Sodhi, 9-135 Archer, 10-142 Unadkat Bowling Ov Md Rn Wk Econ Ex Shivam Mavi 4 0 44 1 11.00 Prasidh Krishna 4 0 35 2 8.75 Sunil Narine 4 0 29 1 7.25 1w Andre Russell 3 0 13 2 4.33 Kuldeep Yadav 4 0 20 4 5.00 Kolkata Knight Riders 1st innings Sunil Narine c Krishnappa Gowtham b Ben Stokes 21 Chris Lynn c Anureet Singh b Ben Stokes 45 Robin Uthappa c Rahul Tripathi b Ben Stokes 4 Nitish Rana lbw Ish Sodhi 21 Dinesh Karthik Not Out 41 Andre Russell Not Out 11 Extras 0b 1lb 0nb 0pen 1w 2 Total (18.0 overs) 145-4 Fall of Wickets : 1-21 Narine, 2-36 Uthappa, 3-69 Rana, 4-117 Lynn Did Not Bat : Gill, Scantlebury-Searles, Krishna, Mavi, Yadav Bowling Ov Md Rn Wk Econ Ex Krishnappa Gowtham 2 0 32 0 16.00 Ben Stokes 4 1 15 3 3.75 1w Jofra Archer 4 0 43 0 10.75 Ish Sodhi 4 0 21 1 5.25 Jaydev Unadkat 3 0 23 0 7.67 Anureet Singh 1 0 10 0 10.00 Umpire Handunnettige Dharmasena Umpire Anil Chaudhary Video Vineet Kulkarni Match Referee Manu Nayyar
